channel.title: Qgis-Plugins on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Qgis-Plugins on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: XLSForm Converter: unlock a world of surveys with our brand new QGIS plugin
item.description:
Today marks the initial release of our brand-new QGIS plugin, XLSForm Converter.
As the name suggests, the plugin converts XLSForm survey files into ready-to-use QGIS projects with a preconfigured survey attribute form.

Migrating to QField was never easier!

Even more exciting is that the converted QGIS project includes all the necessary settings for use with QField, thanks to a nifty QFieldCloud integration. With just a single checkbox, you can upload your generated project to the cloud and begin gathering dataâ€”either as a standalone surveyor or collaboratively as part of a team.
